name: Southern First Bancshares, Inc.
description: Southern First Bancshares, Inc. is a financial services holding company headquartered in Greenville, South Carolina. Established in 1999, the company primarily operates through its wholly owned subsidiary, Southern First Bank, which provides a range of banking services including personal and business banking, wealth management, and mortgage lending. The bank focuses on building strong relationships with customers, offering tailored financial solutions that meet their unique needs. Southern First Bancshares is committed to community involvement and financial education, striving to make a positive impact in the regions it serves. The bank has experienced significant growth through a combination of organic growth and strategic acquisitions, expanding its footprint across South Carolina and into Georgia. In addition to its banking services, Southern First emphasizes the importance of technology in banking, providing customers with innovative online and mobile banking solutions to enhance their banking experience. With a strong focus on customer service and community engagement, Southern First Bancshares aims to be a trusted financial partner for individuals and businesses alike.
